name: Oh! If Only He Were as Faithful to Me
description: Oh! If Only He Were as Faithful to Me; Jean-Honoré Fragonard (French, 1732 - 1806); France; about 1770 - 1775; Black chalk and brush with brown wash over black chalk; 24.8 x 38.4 cm (9 3/4 x 15 1/8 in.); 82.GB.165; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Oh! If Only He Were as Faithful to Me
medium: Black chalk and brush with brown wash over black chalk
